Today in County Sligo, Dunmoran Strand and Lackan Bay are lighting up with 2 ft @ 11s NNW swell, complemented by light E winds at 6 mph. Best windows are from 08:56 to 16:20. Tomorrow, conditions drop with 2 ft @ 8s N swell and light ENE winds, making it a poor day for surf. The day after continues the trend with similar poor conditions. Best: today.
